home_hero_tagline: SULOC: Reliable logistics facilitation, visa assistance, and administrative services.
slide_visa_desc: File preparation, document verification, and orientation according to the visa type.
slide_logistics_desc: Freight organization, shipment tracking, and maritime/freight forwarding coordination.
slide_admin_desc: Reliable information to secure your procedures and optimize your time.
slide_vehicles_desc: Imported vehicle catalog with comprehensive support.
section_services_desc: We offer a complete range of solutions for your logistics, visa, and administrative facilitation needs.
section_team_desc: A dedicated team of professionals to support you in all your logistics and administrative procedures.
form_quote_subtitle: Fill out our project form. We will get back to you as soon as possible to start our collaboration.
footer_tagline: Your trusted partner for logistics and transfers.
about_title: Your Strategic Partner in Logistics and Consulting
about_main_text: SULOC (Success Logistics Company) is a dynamic company specialized in logistics facilitation, visa assistance, and administrative services. We support individuals and organizations in the success of their projects through reliable and tailored solutions.
about_intervention_4: Import and distribution of certified vehicles
about_step1_desc: We start by understanding your specific needs to propose the most suitable and economical solution.
about_step2_desc: Each file benefits from personalized and proactive follow-up to ensure compliance with agreed deadlines.
about_step3_desc: Our vast network of freight forwarders and advisors allows us to operate efficiently on a regional and international scale.
logistics_page_desc: Seamless supply chain solutions via Mombasa and Dar es Salaam.
logistics_stage1_desc: Negotiation with suppliers and logistics planning.
logistics_stage2_desc: Ship arrival at Mombasa or Dar es Salaam.
logistics_stage5_desc: Arrival at your warehouse or door.
rfq_port_info: Mombasa typically serves North DRC/Rwanda; Dar es Salaam serves Burundi/South DRC.
rfq_success_desc: Our logistics team will contact you shortly with a formal quote.
visa_page_subtitle: Find detailed information for all countries and destinations.
visa_no_services: No visa services available at the moment.
remittance_hero_title: Send Money with Peace of Mind
remittance_hero_subtitle: Secure platform for your transfers to DRC and Burundi. SULOC is not an exchange bureau but a financial bridge.
remittance_track_subtitle: Enter your unique secret code to verify the status of your remittance.
remittance_err_desc: Check your secret code or contact support.
remittance_eco_step1_desc: Deposit funds into our secure accounts or in cash.
remittance_eco_step3_desc: Receive a code to share with the beneficiary.
veh_catalog_subtitle: Browse our catalog of imported, inspected and ready to drive vehicles. Quality and transparency guaranteed by SULOC.
veh_no_results_title: No vehicles available at the moment
veh_no_results_desc: Our stock is updated regularly. Check back soon or contact us for a personalized search.
veh_help_desc: Call our experts for more info:
veh_sold_notice: This vehicle has already been sold. It remains visible for information only.
veh_negotiating_notice: This vehicle is currently under negotiation.
